briefTitle: Open-Label Safety Study of AXS-05 in Subjects With Depression

armGroups.label: AXS-05
interventionNames: Drug: AXS-05 (dextromethorphan and bupropion) oral tablets

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of major depressive disorder, including treatment resistant depression
* Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 40 kg/m\^2, inclusive
* Agree to use adequate method of contraception for the duration of the study
* Additional criteria may apply

Exclusion Criteria:

* Suicide risk
* Pregnant, breastfeeding, or planning to become pregnant or breastfeed during the study
* Additional criteria may apply

outcomeMeasures.title: Incidence of Treatment-emergent AEs (TEAEs) Following Dosing With AXS-05
outcomeMeasures.description: Types and rates of adverse events
